response.job_title: Controls Engineer at Swisslog GmbH. MSc Automation and Robotics.
response.summary:
I am a Mechatronics Engineer with a master in Automation and Robotics. 
My knowledge is focused on PLC and industrial robots programming and the integration of them in complex production systems, but also includes high level programming (C++, C#).

I have more than 5 years experience in automation projects, developing the software and hardware configuration and programming PLCs (Omron and Siemens) and industrial robots (Kuka, ABB and Fanuc). 

I am permanently part of the engineering process of new solutions for the costumers, as well as developing, documentation and technical support. 

I am an easy learner, independent and team worker.
response.skills: Automation, Robotics, Industrial Robots, Control Systems Design, Ingeniería, Programación, Engineering, Programming, PLC Programming, Software Development, Technical Documentation, PLC, C#, Matlab, C++, LaTeX, Microsoft Office, Teaching, Customer Support, Inglés

profile_positions.description: R&D team at Robogistics Technology Center
profile_positions.title: Control Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Programming, simulation and commissioning for automation projects using FANUC robots and SIEMENS and Rockwell PLC. Projects for internal transportation of metal parts for car and food industries
- Programming of Siemens PLC (TIA Portal) and Rockwell. FANUC robots (Roboguide)
- Commissioning
- Motor control: frequency converters and Servomotors
- HMI Development
- Documentation
- Customer support
profile_positions.title: Automation Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Programming and commissioning of automation projects, using KUKA and ABB robots and Omron PLC for palletizing, depalletizing, picking and painting projects. 

- Robot and PLC programming. Both, adapting programs and from scratch.
- Industrial networks (Ethernet/IP, DeviceNet, Profinet).
- Robot Simulation with KUKA and ABB.
- Software development in C# using ABB SDKs.
- HMI programming, security systems.
profile_positions.title: Robots and PLC Programmer

company.name: Swisslog
company.description:
SWISSLOG - A GLOBAL PROVIDER OF DATA-DRIVEN AND ROBOTIC INTRALOGISTICS SOLUTIONS 

The right level of automation at your distribution facility could set you in the direction of success. Swisslog designs, develops and delivers a wide range of automation solutions, from tote to pallet based, goods to person technologies, intelligent software and self-learning robotics. It is our aim to ensure our customers have everything they need to optimize logistics and deliver the right products, to the right place, at the right time. 

Swisslog Logistics Automation has improved performance for companies in multiple industries including: 
•    Retail & E-Commerce – improving accuracy, pick rates, and inventory & returns management
•    Beverage - delivering greater efficiency and space utilisation
•    Food & Temperature Controlled - maximizing throughput for the freshest delivery 
•    Pharmaceuticals – reliable transport, storage, order fulfillment and quality control

Swisslog is a member of the KUKA Group, a leading global supplier of intelligent automation solution.

Link to imprint: https://www.swisslog.com/en-us/footer/legal-disclaimer/
